CustomField.description: Sorts the Financiers in the same order as the CBATS
CustomField.formula: CASE( Finance_Key__c, 'Credit Human - Loan', '1', 'Enfin - Loan', '2', 'Enfin - TPO', '3', 'Everbright - TPO', '4', 'Goodleap - TPO', '5', 'Sunrun - TPO', '6', 'Cash (Paykeeper) - Cash', '7', '8')
CustomField.label: Sort Order
